Description: Single table star projection
'Single table star projection with ordering
column13:
-k 7,7 -k 6,6 | head -n19 | tail -n+5'
Two table star and column projection mixed,'SELECT E.*, D.name, D.city, D.state FROM EMPLOYEES E, DEPARTMENTS D','echo ID
column26:
-j 8 /tmp/term_sql_EMPLOYEES /tmp/term_sql_DEPARTMENTS | cut -c 2-'
Single table projection with named columns,'SELECT last_name, first_name, title, salary FROM EMPLOYEES','echo LAST_NAME
column34:
-f " | tail -n+2'
Single table projection with reference fields from table with headers,'SELECT #2 LAST_NAME, #3 FIRST_NAME, #5 TITLE, #7 SALARY FROM EMPLOYEES','echo LAST_NAME

Description: Single table projection with reference fields from table without headers
Two table projection with named columns
column7: state FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.d_id == D.id'

Description: Two table projection with reference fields from tables with headers
column7: D.#4 STATE FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON d_id == D.id'

Description: Two table projection with reference fields from tables without headers
column7: D.#4 STATE FROM EMPLOYEES_NO_HEADERS E JOIN DEPARTMENTS_NO_HEADERS D ON E.#4 == D.#1'

Description: Single table simple selection with named columns
Single table simple selection with reference fields from table with headers
Single table simple selection with reference fields from table no headers
Single table complex selection with named columns
column4: title FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE (age < 25 AND salary > 75000 ) OR (age < 30 AND salary > 85000)'

Description: Single table complex selection with reference fields from table with headers
column4: #5 TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE (#6 < 25 AND #7 > 75000 ) OR (age < 30 AND salary > 85000)'

Description: Single table complex selection with reference fields from table no headers
column4: #5 TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES_NO_HEADERS WHERE (#6 < 25 AND #7 > 75000 ) OR (#6 < 30 AND #7 > 85000)'

Description: Two table complex selection with named columns
column9: DEPARTMENTS D WHERE E.d_id == D.id AND D.state == ''CA'' AND E.age > 50'

Description: Two table complex selection with reference fields from tables with headers
column9: DEPARTMENTS D WHERE E.#4 == D.#1 AND D.#4 == ''CA'' AND E.#6 > 50'

Description: Two table complex selection with reference fields from tables without headers
column9: DEPARTMENTS_NO_HEADERS D WHERE E.#4 == D.#1 AND D.#4 == ''CA'' AND E.#6 > 50'

Description: Two table join with complex selection by named columns
column8: state FROM EMPLOYEES RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENTS ON EMPLOYEES.d_id == DEPARTMENTS.id WHERE DEPARTMENTS.state == ''CA'' AND EMPLOYEES.age > 50'

Description: Two table join with selection by reference fields from tables with headers
column8: D.#4 state FROM EMPLOYEES E RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.#4 == D.#1 WHERE D.#4 == ''CA'' AND E.#6 > 50'

Description: Two table join with selection by reference fields from tables without headers
column8: D.#4 state FROM EMPLOYEES_NO_HEADERS E RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENTS_NO_HEADERS D ON E.#4 == D.#1 WHERE D.#4 == ''CA'' AND E.#6 > 50'

Description: Single table selection with group by named columns
column4: avg(salary) FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE age > 30 GROUP BY title'

Description: Single table selection with group by reference fields from table with headers
column4: avg(#7) ''AVG(SALARY)'' FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE #6 > 30 GROUP BY #5'

Description: Single table selection with group by reference fields from tables without headers
column4: avg(#7) ''AVG(SALARY)'' FROM EMPLOYEES_NO_HEADERS WHERE #6 > 30 GROUP BY #5'

Description: Two table selection with group by named columns
column5: EMPLOYEES E WHERE D.id == E.d_id AND E.age < 30 GROUP BY D.name'

Description: Two table selection with group by reference fields from tables with headers
column5: EMPLOYEES E WHERE D.#1 == E.#4 AND E.#6 < 30 GROUP BY D.#2'

Description: Two table selection with group by reference fields from tables without headers
column5: EMPLOYEES_NO_HEADERS E WHERE D.#1 == E.#4 AND E.#6 < 30 GROUP BY D.#2'
